name: Lifeslide
description:
StoryThis is the story of life. Lifeslide is a seamless, continuous adventure through all stages of life. Each level, with its symbolic environment represents a segment from the human life and is open to interpretation by the player. No narration, no texts - this is your journey and you make the rules.GameplayFlying a paper plane can be harder than you think as the only way to accelerate and decelerate is to use gravity and air friction. Each level has its own unique gimmicks that can either pose as an obstacle or be used to your advantage.
As in real life, finding the right balance is essential. You will be faced with the constant dilema of what to pursue.
Time will allow you to fly longer and Matter will help you improve.
Improvement is crucial for the progress. Using Matter you can increase your aerodynamics, maneuverability, traction and other properties. In a sense, in order to reach the next stage in life, you have to grow.
Different unlockable paper planes that fit different play styles.
Game ModesStory - play through the entire timeline of life in chronological order
Endless - Play only your favorite part of the game for as long as you can
Challenge - Custom challenge levels that will require you to figure out the best way to tackle them
